summary: This bill, the Secure Rural Schools Reauthorization Act of 2025, extends the Secure Rural Schools and Community Self-Determination Act of 2000. It amends various sections of the original act regarding payments to states and counties containing federal land, special project authority, and resource advisory committee programs. The bill specifically addresses payments for fiscal years 2024 and 2025 and makes technical corrections to existing provisions. It aims to provide funding and support for rural communities and the management of federal lands.
